import java.util.*;
class Arya
{
	public static char[] toChar(String str)
	{
		int i,len=str.length();
		char[] arr=new char[len];
		for(i=0;i<len;i++)
			arr[i]=str.charAt(i);
		return arr;
	}
	public static void main(String[] args)
	{
		int t,i,len1,len2,ans,x;
		String str1,str2;
		int[] alphabetUpper1=new int[27];
		int[] alphabetLower1=new int[27];
		int[] alphabetUpper2=new int[27];
		int[] alphabetLower2=new int[27];
		int[] intgr1=new int[10];
		int[] intgr2=new int[10];
		char[] arr1,arr2;
		Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);
		t=sc.nextInt();
		while(t-->0)
		{
			for(i=0;i<27;i++)
			{
				alphabetUpper1[i]=0;
				alphabetLower1[i]=0;
				alphabetUpper2[i]=0;
				alphabetLower2[i]=0;
			}
			for(i=0;i<10;i++)
			{
				intgr1[i]=0;
				intgr2[i]=0;
			}
			str1=sc.next();
			str2=sc.next();
			len1=str1.length();
			len2=str2.length();
			arr1=Arya.toChar(str1);
			arr2=Arya.toChar(str2);
			for(i=0;i<len1;i++)
			{
				x=(int)arr1[i];
				if(x>=48&&x<=57)
					intgr1[x-48]=1;
				else if(x>=65&&x<=90)
					alphabetUpper1[x-64]=1;
				else
					alphabetLower1[x-96]=1;
			}
			for(i=0;i<len2;i++)
			{
				x=(int)arr2[i];
				if(x>=48&&x<=57)
					intgr2[x-48]=1;
				else if(x>=65&&x<=90)
					alphabetUpper2[x-64]=1;
				else
					alphabetLower2[x-96]=1;
			}
			ans=0;
			for(i=0;i<10;i++)
				if(intgr1[i]==1&&intgr2[i]==1)
					ans++;
			for(i=1;i<27;i++)
				if(alphabetLower1[i]==1&&alphabetLower2[i]==1)
					ans++;
			for(i=1;i<27;i++)
				if(alphabetUpper1[i]==1&&alphabetUpper2[i]==1)
					ans++;
			System.out.println(ans);
		}
	}
}
